#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
 using namespace std;
unsigned long long int fun(unsigned long long int n)
{
	int i;
unsigned long long int ans=1;
	unsigned long long int fact[]={1,1,2,6,24,120,720,5040,40320,362880,3628800,39916800,479001600};
 if(n<=12)
 	return fact[n];
 
 for(i=13;i<=n;i++)
 {
 	ans*=i;
 }
 ans*=fact[12];
 return ans;
}
 
int main()
{
	int t,n,i;
	unsigned long long int ans=0,fact1;
	scanf("%d",&t);
 while(t--)
 {ans=0;
 	scanf("%d",&n);
 	fact1=fun(n);
 	for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
 	{
 		if(i%2==0)
 			ans+=(fact1/fun(i));
 		else
 			ans-=(fact1/fun(i));
 	}
 	printf("%llu\n",ans);
 }
return 0;
}
